submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        total = 0
        horizontalPieces = 1
        verticalPieces = 1
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        i = 0
        j = 0
        while i < m - 1 and j < n - 1:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                total += horizontalCut[i] * verticalPieces
                i += 1
                horizontalPieces +=1
            else:
                total += verticalCut[j] * horizontalPieces
                j += 1
                verticalPieces +=1
        while i < m - 1:
            total += horizontalCut[i] * verticalPieces
            i += 1
        while j < n - 1:
            total += verticalCut[j] * horizontalPieces
            j += 1
        return total
